title: Great Hall (4U353)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Twilight:	3
Card Type:	Site
Site:	6T
Game Text:	Sanctuary. Battleground. Each [Rohan] ally may participate in archery fire and skirmishes at Great Hall.
Rarity:	U
Notes:	Each [Rohan] ally participates in archery fire and skirmishes at this site as if this were his or her home site.
